summary: Add new "stand alone" female Dremora follower -CBBE- to the game.
descriptionHtml:
[center]LETHIA THE DREMORA FOLLOWER

Add new stand alone female Dremora follower -CBBE- to the game.

Character Backstory :

Lethia are lesser dremora left alone to guard ancient fort by order of daedric prince Vaermina, after millennia by
guarding the fort she become boring and decide it to go for adventure but by doing so she will be punished for
deserting the artifact staff of corruption inside the fort, ones to do so she let an orc's intruders pass by her
to inner sanctum of nightcaller temple for destroying the staff but her plan was fail, before the orc's manage to
destroy the staff the priest of vaermina activate "the miasma" and put anyone to deep sleep.
so now she keep guarding the fort until one day someone come for the artifact Staff of corruption
and take her for adventure all over tamriel.

Name    : Lethia

Body    : CBBE

Weight    : 80

Level    : 25

Class    : Dremora Melee

Armor    : CBBE Daedric Female

Weapon    : Daedric Warhammer

Location :
Dawnstar Nightcaller Temple

Required :
Skyrim.esm

Credit :

BETHESDA
